Key Match Events: Traore scored in the 35th and 38th minutes for Burkina Faso.
Bande scored a penalty in the 60th minute for Burkina Faso.
Nkhoma scored in the 80th minute for Malawi.
Chaziya received a yellow card in the 59th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Burkina Faso drew their first match 1-1 against Senegal with a last-minute equalizer by Ousseni Bouda.
Malawi lost their first match 3-2 at home to Burundi.
Burkina Faso has not won in their last eight games in all competitions.
Malawi has only won one of their last six games in all competitions.
